definitions: Calls on (a deity or spirit) in prayer, as a witness, or for inspiration.
Appeals to (someone or something) as an authority for an action or in support of an argument.
Calls forth a feeling, image, or memory.
Cites or appeals to (a law, right, or principle) in support of one's actions or argument.
examples: The priest invokes the blessings of the gods.
The smell of the sea invokes memories of her childhood.
